blocks.heading: Ship a SharePoint your people actually use
blocks.description: Your documents are scattered. Your teams are frustrated. Your SharePoint investment isn't delivering. SSW's SharePoint experts customize solutions that fit your business; not force your business to fit SharePoint.

blocks.heading: The benefits of Microsoft SharePoint
blocks.description: Organizations are extremely good at accumulating data. Mostly in the form of documents and records, this data is often haphazardly located across the organization, and poorly integrated into document processes. SharePoint aims to improve the situation by storing all documents & records in a centralized system. They can store every version of a document, allow you to enforce information management policies, and improve efficiency by automating common business processes.
